item.title: Version 0.0.143
item.description:
PlunderTube 0.0.143

üì• Download

  • DMG Installer: PlunderTube.0.0.143.dmg
  • PKG Installer: PlunderTube.0.0.143.pkg

üì¶ What's Included

  • Audio Unit (AU) Plugin
  • VST3 Plugin
  • Standalone Application
  • PlunderTube Diagnostics Tool
  • Automatic Python/UV environment setup
  • FFmpeg and yt-dlp included
# Release Notes for Version 0.0.143

Features
  • **Initial Release**: Introduced the foundational version of the application, providing users with a base set of functionalities.

Improvements
  • Enhanced user interface for a more intuitive experience.

    • Fixes
  • Resolved minor bugs to improve overall application stability.

    • üíæ Installation

    1. Download the DMG file
    2. Open and run the PKG installer
    3. Restart your DAW if running

    ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

    • macOS 14.0 or later (ARM64)
    • Compatible DAW for plugin formats

    Release Type: RELEASE
